General.Name: U-Best Polymer Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: U-Best Innovative Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells PU synthetic resin products. The company offers PU synthetic resins, PU adhesives, surface treatment agents, solvents, nylon resins, polyester polyols, composite materials and raw materials, water-based resins, bridging agents, wet curing reaction products, polyester polyols, plastic polyurethane elastomer TPUs, and flexible OLED hard coat film products. Its products are used in sports shoe materials, fire-resistant anti-fouling, waterproof and moisture-permeable, furniture and clothing, and footwear and leather goods industries, as well as other industrial applications. The company also develops and leases residential buildings. U-Best Innovative Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2.Name: Xu Zhe Yuan
